content: a beginner friendly amigurumi pattern that uses only single crochets increases and decreases cat is worked in head and body portions which are joined before adding limbs and tail heart begins as two individual domes before they are joined and completed with larger rounds balloon can either have a long tail that looks more like the ribbon of a balloon when lying down or glued to a wooden chopstick to make it a balloon stick and stay upright when cat is standing used 65g of a 100g 131yd ball of chenille yarn
